channel.title: experimental on Front Left by the Speaker
channel.description: Recent content in experimental on Front Left by the Speaker

item.title: HUNDI
item.description: January 10, 2024 / 7-8PM: HUNDI For this occasion, you can expect a slower mix full of cerebral vocals, glitchy synths and dubby baselines - keywords are post-human esoteric ritual HUNDI’s selections bite into contemporary futuristic soundscapes full of textured rhythms and harmonious keys, showcasing a variety of genres and a captivating presence. Links: Instagram

item.title: Accuraat
item.description: December 13th 2023 - 19:00 - 20:00: Accuraat Other half of Front Left by the Speaker Explore sonic realms with Accuraat featuring a blend of breakbeat, garage, and drum n bass, oscillating between introspective melodies and cerebral, energetic beats. Links: Instagram linktree RA
